scripts.build:prod: run-script-if --bool $([ $(command -v helm) ] && echo true || echo false) --then "helm package -d ./dist ./src"
scripts.helm:delete: run-script-if --bool $([ $(command -v helm) ] && echo true || echo false) --then "helm delete kie-sandbox-extended-services-helm-chart"
scripts.helm:install: run-script-if --bool $([ $(command -v helm) ] && echo true || echo false) --then "helm install kie-sandbox-extended-services-helm-chart ./src"
